rukus.text: 12|7|sillo yosebgwa geuui hyeongjedeul-ui sosig-eun guhaneun ideul-eul wihan gyohun ila
12|8|geuttae geudeul hyeongjedeul-i malhadeolayosebgwa geuui auneun him-i sen uliboda abeojiui salang-i deohani sil lo uli abeojineun banghwanghago iss-eum ila

12|9|geuligo malhagil yoseb-eul salhaehadeonji animyeon meongos-eulo bonaela geu lihamyeon abeojiui eunhye moduga neo huiui geos-i doel geos-imyeo geuhu neohui neun jeong-uiloun baegseong-i doelila hani
12|10|geu gaunde hansalam-i malhagileul yoseb-eul jug-iji malgo geuleul umulsog-eulo deonjyeobeolila geulihamyeon jinagadeon daesang-i geuleul jueogalila
12|11|geudeul-i malhagileul abeoji yo seb-e daehayeo wae jeohuileul midji anh-eu sibnikka jeohuineun geuleul wihan chingudeul ibnida
12|12|jeohuiwa hamkke bonaeeo geuga jeulgeobge noldolog hayeo jusoseo jeohuineun geuleul wihan bohojadeul-ibnida hadeola
12|13|yagob-i malhadoe neohuiga geuleul meolli deligo gam-eun naleul seulpeuge ham imyeo ttohan neohuiga geuleul dolboji a nihal ttae neugdaega geuleul meog-eobeolilkka dulyeobnola hani
12|14|ittae geudeul-i malhagileul man-il neugdaega geuleul samkindamyeon jeohuineun han hyeongjelosseo sonsiljadeul-i doenaida

12|15|geulihayeo geudeul-i geuleul deli go gass-eulttae hab-uihayeo geuleul umulmit e deonjigilo hayeoss-euni bola hana nim-i geuege gyesihayeo geudeul-i haeng haneun igeos-eul josimhala illeoss-eudoe geudeul-eun alji moshadeola

12|17|malhagileul abeoji jeohuiga bakk-eulo naga seolo gyeongjuleul hamyeonseo yoseb-eul jeohui jim yeop-e dueossneunde neug daega geuleul samkyeossnaida dangsin-eun jeo huileul midji anh-eusina jeohuineun sillo jinsilhan jadeul-ibnida

12|18|geu jeung-geolo geudeul-eun geojispigamud-eun yoseb-ui us-eul gajyeowassdeola i ttae abeojiga malsseumhasigileul neohui seuseuloga eotteon il-eul sog-igo iss-eu na naneun neohuiui geojis-e innaehago issnani neohuiga geojis-eulo myosahaneungeos-e daehae hananim-eun naui guwonja isila

12|19|daesangdeul-i geugos-e ileuleo mul-eul guhalyeo bonaeni geuga dulebag-eul umulsog-eulo neoh-eossdeola geuga solichyeomalhagileul joh-eun sosig-ila igeos-eun sonyeon-i aninga geudeul-eun geuleul sangpum eulo gamchueoss-euna hananim-eun geudeul i haenghaneun geosdeul-eul algo gyesyeossdeola
12|20|geudeul-eun geuleul soaeg-ui eunjeon myeochpun-eulo pal-abeolini geuleul hachanhge ganjuhayeossdeola
